content: **knitted play suit for baby in drops babymerino piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch and garter stitch size 0 - 4 years** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-145-by yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years size equals approx kid s height in cm 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100-100 100-100 g colour 38 olive **buttons** drops button no 503 5 pieces **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
